# uv-input



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                                               | Type                                                            | Default  |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | (optional) Whether the form control is disabled                                           | `boolean`                                                       | `false`  |
| `form`        | `form`        | (optional) Associates the control with a form element                                     | `string`                                                        | `null`   |
| `maxlength`   | `maxlength`   | (optional) Maximum length (number of characters) of value                                 | `number`                                                        | `null`   |
| `minlength`   | `minlength`   | (optional) Minimum length (number of characters) of value                                 | `number`                                                        | `null`   |
| `name`        | `name`        | (optional) Name of the form control. Submitted with the form as part of a name/value pair | `string`                                                        | `null`   |
| `pattern`     | `pattern`     | (optional) Pattern the value must match to be valid                                       | `string`                                                        | `null`   |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder` | (optional) Text that appears in the form control when it has no value set                 | `string`                                                        | `null`   |
| `readonly`    | `readonly`    | (optional) The value is not editable                                                      | `boolean`                                                       | `false`  |
| `required`    | `required`    | (optional) A value is required or must be checked for the form to be submittable          | `boolean`                                                       | `false`  |
| `size`        | `size`        | (optional) Size of the control                                                            | `number`                                                        | `null`   |
| `type`        | `type`        | (optional) Input type default: 'text'                                                     | `"email" \| "password" \| "search" \| "tel" \| "text" \| "url"` | `'text'` |
| `value`       | `value`       | (optional) The initial value of the control                                               | `string`                                                        | `null`   |


## Events

| Event     | Description | Type                  |
| --------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `updated` |             | `CustomEvent<string>` |
